article.title: The Making of a Library
article.author: Taylor, R.S.
article.text: A book like this is a cumulation of experience, thought, error, and hopefully, learning of many years. It did not start, like a water faucet, at precisely that moment in 1967 when the Office of Education so kindly awarded a grant to Hampshire college for the development of the concept of the extended and experimenting library, although the grant was certainly the means for, and a spur to, it formalization.
